info.author: Dominik George
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.name: AlekSIS-Core

vulnerabilities.details: An access control issue in aleksis/core/util/auth_helpers.py: ClientProtectedResourceMixin of AlekSIS-Core v2.8.1 and below allows attackers to access arbitrary scopes if no allowed scopes are specifically set.
